RM8P01
Mario Party 8

Max Coupons [Romaap]
0277464A 0000270F

The player checker [Romaap]
283052F0 00001300
0225F71E 00000001
0225F836 00000002
0225F94E 00000003
0225FA66 00000004
This will let you know who is player 1,2,3 or 4; The player with 1 coin is player 1, the player with 2 coins is player 2, 3 coins is P3 and 4 coins is P4
press 1+2+-

+1 step

Player 1 +1 step [Romaap]
283052F0 00000801
82000000 8025F707
86000000 00000001
84000000 8025F707
E0000000 80008000
Press A+L

Player 2 +1 step [Romaap]
283052F0 00000808
82000000 8025F81F
86000000 00000001
84000000 8025F81F
E0000000 80008000
Press A+U

Player 3 +1 step [Romaap]
283052F0 00000802
82000000 8025F937
86000000 00000001
84000000 8025F937
E0000000 80008000
Press A+R

Player 4 +1 step [Romaap]
283052F0 00000804
82000000 8025FA4F
86000000 00000001
84000000 8025FA4F
E0000000 80008000
Press A+D

Player Note
You can see who is player 1,2,3 or 4 with the player checker

End Turn (0 steps left)

End turn P1 [Romaap]
283052F0 00000C01
0025F707 00000000
E0000000 80008000
Press A+B+L

283052F0 00000C08
0025F81F 00000000
E0000000 80008000
Press A+B+U

0025F937 00000000
E0000000 80008000
Press A+B+R

End turn P4 [Romaap]

0025FA4F 00000000
E0000000 80008000
Press A+B+D

You can see who is player 1,2,3 or 4 with the player checker
